page.title: 09Thame Industry 3-Angus
page.content: Angus fire armour is one of the largest employers in Thame.They sell fire extinguishers and other fire fighting apparatus.Angus opened in Thame in 1968.We visited Mr.John Boshell who is the export manager.He travels to Africa,the Far East, and Europe selling fire armour.He exports mostly to dry countries,because the heat causes fires.Thame is the head office for Angus in the U.K.It handles 10 million pounds of business each year.They protect airports,oil refineries,space ships,power stations,and many other types of buildings. There are 180 people employed at the Thame office and this is one of the town's biggest employers. World wide the company has 2000 employees. Angus rents 20% of the industrial estate in Thame.
